page.title: 02WARDEN PARK SCHOOL CUCKFIELD
page.content: It was built in 1956 and has been a Comprehensive since 1974. It has large grounds, 1,400 Pupils, 74 Teachers and 25+ non-teaching staff. The headmaster is Mr. Trethowan who is assisted by 3 deputy heads. There are five houses of 2nd to 5th years mixed, each house has 8 Tutor Groups, 1 House Head, 1 Deputy House Head and 1 Tutor per Tutor Group. All 1st years are in one House. There are also heads of different subjects. There is a great choice in subject areas eg: English, Maths, Sciences, Languages, Practical Subjects, Arts and Humanities. Pupils are setted in most subjects after the first year. There are many after school clubs eg: Sports, Music, Drama, Languages and Computers. The uniform is grey for years 1 to 3 and navy blue for years 4 and 5.
